title: Bali Tourism Board - Your Bali travel guide
description: Providing travel information and tips for tourists visiting Bali: Balinese culture, art, festivals, hotels, travel agents, government services.

## About Bali
One of the most popular tourist destinations in the world, Bali for few years awarded as the world best island by  
The International Travel Magazine. There, however, are still many people who do not know in depth about the uniqueness of Balinese culture. Life in Bali is always related to Tri Hita Karana or a tripartite concept that include the spiritual relationship between human and God, and their environment.
The rapid growth of development in tourism has had a big impact and influences to Bali tradition and lifestyle. Interestingly, Balinese culture is still as what it was, growing along with the of globalization. It is the Balinese civilization what makes the island different from other destination.
### [Geography](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_geography.html "Bali Geography")
Among 17,500 islands across the Indonesian archipelago, Bali is one of the 33 provinces of the Republic of Indonesia…
### [Climate](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_climate.html "Bali Climate")
With sunshine shining throughout the year, Bali has a tropical monsoon climate, with pleasant day temperatures between 20 to 33 degrees Celsius…
### [Topography](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_topolgraphy.html "Bali Topography")
The province of Bali is divided into nine regencies (eight regencies and one municipality) with its own capital…
### [Flora & Fauna](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_flora-and-fauna.html "Bali Flora and Fauna")
Just like common tropical islands, in Bali you will find a wide variety of plants by surprise. Huge banyan trees are everywhere in the villages…
### [People & Life Style](https://balitourismboard.org/people-and-life-style.html "Balinese People and their Life Style")
Bali s population of over 3,000,000 souls spread over the whole island, including those in the smaller islands of Nusa Penida, Nusa Ceningan, Nusa Lembongan…
### [How to get to Bali](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_how-to-get-to-bali.html "How to get to Bali")
With the increasing number of direct flight to Bali from some other parts of the world, it makes it easier to go to Bali…
### [Economic](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_economic.html "Economy of Bali")
As the most populous area of the island the southern part Bali is where most jobs are to be found, mostly in the hotel or tourist industry…
### [Local Transportation](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_local-transport.html "Local Transportation of Bali")
Because of the size of the island, it is not difficult to get around Bali by various modes of transportation. The traditional types of transportation…
### [History](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_history.html "History of Bali")
Bali has a long chain of history from the ice-age era (pre-historic time) to modern, global civilization era. With a dynamic characteristic indicating…
### [Bali Map](https://balitourismboard.org/bali_maps.html "Map of Bali")
Use our interactive map of Bali, or download and print various maps of Bali: common island, tourist attractions map, cities, and other. Also there is…
